title: misc/cgo/testcarchive: TestSigaltstack flake on linux-amd64
body:
```
##### misc/cgo/testcarchive
--- FAIL: TestSigaltstack (0.66s)
	carchive_test.go:438: looping too long waiting for signal
	carchive_test.go:439: exit status 1
```

go version go1.7rc6 linux/amd64

Debian GNU/Linux 8.5 (jessie)

gcc version 4.9.2 (Debian 4.9.2-10)
